data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Jawzjan, Afghanistan honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Jawzjan, Afghanistan
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 747,458, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Jawzjan, Afghanistan.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Jawzjan, Afghanistan into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Brahmin people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Brahmin people know you.
Father, guide the church in Jawzjan, Afghanistan to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 119 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Jawzjan.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

location.name: Jawzjan
location.people_groups_list: Baloch, Western, Arab, Tajiki, Afshari, Changgar, Bania (Muslim traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Baloch, Western (467,000), Arab, Tajiki (18,000), Afshari (15,000), Changgar (3,100), Bania (Muslim traditions) (6,400)
